name: ListServiceUserConversation
description: Retrieve a list of all User Conversations for the User.

ChatServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Conversation Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/conversations/api/service-resource) the Conversation resource is associated with.

UserSid.description: The unique SID identifier of the [User resource](https://www.twilio.com/docs/conversations/api/user-resource). This value can be either the `sid` or the `identity` of the User resource.

PageSize.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

Page.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

PageToken.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.
